assignments.name: Assign_error_message_for_Fetch_Mortgage_Application
assignments.label: Assign error message for Fetch Mortgage Application

assignments.name: Assign_error_message_for_Fetch_User_NLA_Level
assignments.label: Assign error message for Fetch User NLA Level

value.stringValue: Error on retrieving Application Decision record in flow

decisions.name: MatchUserNLALevelToCaseNLALevel
decisions.label: Match User NLA Level To Case NLA Level

Flow.description: FL007-Homes-Manual Decision Flow : This flow runs when user clicks on the Quick action 'Manual Decision' on Residential Loan Application which all the users to run the process related to Manual Decision

formulas.name: FifthCategoryAndReasonValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!FifthCategoryAndReasonPicklist.topValue} != '' && {!FifthCategoryAndReasonPicklist.middleValue} == '' ,'Please select a corresponding reason',IF({!FifthCategoryAndReasonValidation},'','This decline category & reason has already been selected, please choose another'))

formulas.name: FifthNotesValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!FifthRequiredNotes}) < 20 , 'The minimum number of characters allowed in the note is 20', IF( LEN({!FifthRequiredNotes}) > 255 , 'The maximum number of characters allowed in the note is 255', '' ) )

formulas.name: FirstCategoryAndReasonValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!FirstCategoryAndReasonPicklist.topValue} != '' && {!FirstCategoryAndReasonPicklist.middleValue} == '' ,'Please select a corresponding reason',IF({!FirstCategoryAndReasonValidation},'','This decline category & reason has already been selected, please choose another'))

formulas.name: FirstNotesValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!FirstRequiredNotes}) < 20 , 'The minimum number of characters allowed in the note is 20', IF( LEN({!FirstRequiredNotes}) > 255 , 'The maximum number of characters allowed in the note is 255', '' ) )

formulas.name: FourthCategoryAndReasonValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!FourthCategoryAndReasonPicklist.topValue} != '' && {!FourthCategoryAndReasonPicklist.middleValue} == '' ,'Please select a corresponding reason',IF({!FourthCategoryAndReasonValidation},'','This decline category & reason has already been selected, please choose another'))

formulas.name: FourthNotesValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!FourthRequiredNotes}) < 20 , 'The minimum number of characters allowed in the note is 20', IF( LEN({!FourthRequiredNotes}) > 255 , 'The maximum number of characters allowed in the note is 255', '' ) )

formulas.name: OtherCommentsValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!OtherComments}) >0 && LEN({!OtherComments}) <4, 'Please expand your comment. This must at least 4 characters', IF( LEN({!OtherComments}) > 700, 'You have reached the 700 maximum character count - please reduce your comment', '' ) )

formulas.description: Error message for Overall Rationale Accept Screen field
formulas.name: OverallRationaleAcceptScreenValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!OverallRationaleAcceptScreen}) < 20, 'The minimum number of characters allowed is 20', IF( LEN({!OverallRationaleAcceptScreen}) > 32000, 'The maximum number of characters allowed is 32,000', '' ) )

formulas.description: Error message for Overall Rationale field
formulas.name: OverallRationaleValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!OverallRationale}) < 20, 'The minimum number of characters allowed is 20', IF( LEN({!OverallRationale}) > 32000, 'The maximum number of characters allowed is 32,000', '' ) )

formulas.name: SecondCategoryAndReasonValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!SecondCategoryAndReasonPicklist.topValue} != '' && {!SecondCategoryAndReasonPicklist.middleValue} == '' ,'Please select a corresponding reason',IF({!SecondCategoryAndReasonValidation},'','This decline category & reason has already been selected, please choose another'))

formulas.name: SecondNotesValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!SecondRequiredNotes}) < 20 , 'The minimum number of characters allowed in the note is 20', IF( LEN({!SecondRequiredNotes}) > 255 , 'The maximum number of characters allowed in the note is 255', '' ) )

formulas.name: ThirdCategoryAndReasonValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!ThirdCategoryAndReasonPicklist.topValue} != '' && {!ThirdCategoryAndReasonPicklist.middleValue} == '' ,'Please select a corresponding reason',IF({!ThirdCategoryAndReasonValidation},'','This decline category & reason has already been selected, please choose another'))

formulas.name: ThirdNotesValidationMessage
formulas.expression: IF( LEN({!ThirdRequiredNotes}) < 20 , 'The minimum number of characters allowed in the note is 20', IF( LEN({!ThirdRequiredNotes}) > 255 , 'The maximum number of characters allowed in the note is 255', '' ) )

Flow.label: FL007-Homes-Manual Decision Screen Flow

fields.name: MessageTest
fields.fieldText: You are making a manual decision

fields.name: DeclineRecordNotAvailableErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: There must be at least one decision type with a user decision outcome of decline

fields.name: NLALevelFailedErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: You do not have the required mandate level to agree the case

textTemplates.name: DefaultVariableText
textTemplates.text: (user to enter details of applicant with existing mortgage) currently has another mortgage with (user to enter details of existing mortgage company) on (user to enter details of existing property). The Conveyancer must make sure that (user to enter details of applicant with existing mortgage) is/are released from all legal liability under the other mortgage on or before completion/settlement of this mortgage.
